statements: CREATE TABLE TravelInformation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination VARCHAR(255), departure_date DATE, distance DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_name STRING, email STRING);
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_name STRING, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id));
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name STRING, price FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE destinations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE trips (trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination_id INT REFERENCES destinations(id), trip_date DATE NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE travelers (traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE destinations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE trips (id INT PRIMARY KEY, destination_id INT REFERENCES destinations(id), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE travelers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT
CREATE TABLE bookings (id INT PRIMARY KEY, trip_id INT REFERENCES trips(id), traveler_id INT REFERENCES travelers(id), booking_date DATE
CREATE TABLE hotels (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, city STRING, country STRING, rating INT);
CREATE TABLE cars (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, make STRING, model STRING, year INT, color STRING, plate_number STRING);
CREATE TABLE customers (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, address STRING);
